--- title: "3.1 — The Supply and Demand Model — Class Content" execute: freeze: auto --- ::: {.cell} ::: ::: {.callout-note appearance=minimal} # Meeting Date *Wednesday, April 5, 2023* ::: ## Overview Today we bring supply and demand together to talk about equilibrium, and begin to discuss how markets work in the real world. In doing so, we will run a demonstration in class using the [kiviq](kiviq.us) software ([see instructions here](/files/slides/using-kiviq.pdf)). ## Readings - Ch. 3 in Goolsbee, Levitt, and Syverson, 2019 ## Slides Below, you can find the slides in two formats. Clicking the image will bring you to the html version of the slides in a new tab. The lower button will allow you to download a PDF version of the slides. ::: callout-tip You can type h to see a special list of viewing options, and type o for an outline view of all the slides. ::: I suggest printing the slides beforehand and using them to take additional notes in class (*not everything* is in the slides)!
